td.content: s:a 32 yo white M presents with 7 days history of worsening moderate photophobia, moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes and moderate reduced peripheral vision. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 188 cm, Weight 105.7 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:32 yo white m prison officer c/o 8 days h/o moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes. NKDA. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 105.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments.

td.content: s:male aged 33 years presents with severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye for more than 7 weeks. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 188 cm, Weight 104.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:patient reports severe difficulty reading, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. Also complains of severe poor night vision from time to time. he is a white m prison officer aged 33 yrs. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 103.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered Full-Field Electroretinogram.
